languages.text: Челюсть сводит от ярости, а багровые комья глины напоминают растерзанную плоть. Среди них вы нащупываете замотанный в пожелтевшее тряпье сверток.
Your jaw aches from the rage, and the crimson lumps of clay remind you of torn flesh. Your hands find a bundle wrapped in yellowed rags.
languages.original_text: Челюсть сводит от ярости, а багровые комья глины напоминают растерзанную плоть. Среди них вы нащупываете замотанный в пожелтевшее тряпье сверток.

traits.locale_text: Your jaw aches from the rage, and the crimson lumps of clay remind you of torn flesh. Your hands find a bundle wrapped in yellowed rags.

Your jaw aches from the rage, and the crimson lumps of clay remind you of torn flesh. Your hands find a bundle wrapped in yellowed rags.

languages.text: La furia te hace apretar la mandíbula y los trozos de arcilla carmesí se te asemejan a carne desgarrada. Tus manos encuentran un bulto envuelto en trapos amarillentos.
languages.original_text: Your jaw aches from the rage, and the crimson lumps of clay remind you of torn flesh. Your hands find a bundle wrapped in yellowed rags.

traits.locale_text: La furia te hace apretar la mandíbula y los trozos de arcilla carmesí se te asemejan a carne desgarrada. Tus manos encuentran un bulto envuelto en trapos amarillentos.

languages.text: 由于暴怒，你的下巴变得酸痛，那块深红色的泥土让你想起了撕裂的血肉。你的手摸索着，找到了一个被发黄的破布裹着的小包裹。
languages.original_text: Your jaw aches from the rage, and the crimson lumps of clay remind you of torn flesh. Your hands find a bundle wrapped in yellowed rags.

traits.locale_text: 由于暴怒，你的下巴变得酸痛，那块深红色的泥土让你想起了撕裂的血肉。你的手摸索着，找到了一个被发黄的破布裹着的小包裹。

languages.text: 顎が怒りで痛み、深紅の粘土の塊が裂けた肉を思い出させる。手で黄色くなったラグに包まれた束を見つける。
languages.original_text: Your jaw aches from the rage, and the crimson lumps of clay remind you of torn flesh. Your hands find a bundle wrapped in yellowed rags.

traits.locale_text: 顎が怒りで痛み、深紅の粘土の塊が裂けた肉を思い出させる。手で黄色くなったラグに包まれた束を見つける。

languages.text: Dein Kiefer schmerzt angesichts deiner Wut, und die blutroten Lehmklumpen erinnern dich an zerfetztes Fleisch. Deine Hände ertasten ein in gelbe Lumpen geschlagenes Bünde.
languages.original_text: Your jaw aches from the rage, and the crimson lumps of clay remind you of torn flesh. Your hands find a bundle wrapped in yellowed rags.

traits.locale_text: Dein Kiefer schmerzt angesichts deiner Wut, und die blutroten Lehmklumpen erinnern dich an zerfetztes Fleisch. Deine Hände ertasten ein in gelbe Lumpen geschlagenes Bünde.

languages.text: Votre mâchoire se contracte douloureusement sous l'effet de la rage, et les amas d'argile écarlate vous évoquent des morceaux de chair meurtrie. Vos mains rencontrent un paquet emballé dans des lambeaux de tissu jauni.
languages.original_text: Your jaw aches from the rage, and the crimson lumps of clay remind you of torn flesh. Your hands find a bundle wrapped in yellowed rags.

traits.locale_text: Votre mâchoire se contracte douloureusement sous l'effet de la rage, et les amas d'argile écarlate vous évoquent des morceaux de chair meurtrie. Vos mains rencontrent un paquet emballé dans des lambeaux de tissu jauni.

languages.text: Öfkeden çenen ağrıyor. Kil kırmızısı toprak, paramparça edilmiş eti hatırlatıyor. Ellerin, sararmış paçavralara sarılı bir bohça buluyor.
languages.original_text: Your jaw aches from the rage, and the crimson lumps of clay remind you of torn flesh. Your hands find a bundle wrapped in yellowed rags.

traits.locale_text: Öfkeden çenen ağrıyor. Kil kırmızısı toprak, paramparça edilmiş eti hatırlatıyor. Ellerin, sararmış paçavralara sarılı bir bohça buluyor.
